Articles.Content:
News from the VLA.  Apparently some strange source of radio bursts is detectable from a distant galaxy.  The energy st the source must have been impressive.

https://www.sciencenews.org/article/gotcha-fast-radio-bursts-home-nabbed?tgt=nr
It's not only one galaxy, as far as I know. These things happen all over the universe but are very hard to register because of how short they are.

They do happen frequently.  I am more impressed that the VLA can detect these things from such great distances.  

And that it was detected from such a great distance.
